roleset.name: to be cheated, get the short end of the stick
roleset.note: CHEESE-V NOTES: Roleset added in order to provide non-phrasal version of attested instance of phrasal verb. Framed by Claire. (from cheese.01-v)
CHEESED-J NOTES: Roleset based on "cheesed_off" in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. (from cheesed.01-j)

example.name: Passive
example.text: You-1 got cheesed *-1 by not getting that award.

example.name: Passivish
example.text: But alas, she was cheesed by magic...just like her brother.

roleset.name: to anger, irritate
roleset.note: CHEESE_OFF-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01 Task 3. Framed by Claire. (from cheese.02-v)
CHEESED_OFF-J NOTES: Roleset based on "cheesed_off" in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. (from cheesed.02-j)

example.name: cheesed_off-j
example.text: Normally I would say yes , take a nominal amount from your DD2 as she is now " working " , but as you are supporting DD1 , I can see why-1 she-2 might be cheesed *-2 off *T*-1.

example.name: cheesed_off-jAll args
example.text: Pieth, meanwhile said to Bloomberg he was ?cheesed off? by Schenk's remarks.
